name: Krampus (itch) (JamieE2004)
description:
NOTE: It is HIGHLY recommended you use headphones or speakers as audio is a key gameplay mechanic.

Chop down small trees and bring them back to the cabin, but keep an eye out, you're not alone.

Controls 

WASD - Move

Mouse - Look

E - Cut tree

This was made in a college GameJam in collaboration with Chaz111
